mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Need_Skill(notice_id, skill, created_At) VALUES(#{noticeId}, #{skill}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT skill FROM need_Skill WHERE notice_id = ( SELECT notice_id FROM notice WHERE company_Id= (select company_Id from company where user_id = #{userId}) ORDER BY notice_id AND is_closed asc FETCH NEXT 1 ROWS ONLY)
